headline.print_headline: In the Studio: Dries Van Noten
headline.main: In the Studio: Dries Van Noten

snippet: The designer talked about being a control freak, the relationship between making fashion and food, and finding a mummified man in his building.
lead_paragraph: The designer talked about being a control freak, the relationship between making fashion and food, and finding a mummified man in his building.
